title: Looking for a team
body:
Silver player looking for a ranked team. doesn't need to be super competitive. just want to find a group of people to grow as a team and play with

add me in game: lachiesummer

(can play anywhere)

replies.body: Hi there, i am currently looking to make a ranked team and was wondering if you would be interested, i have sent you a friend request on league and would love to hear back from you.
